snippet.title: WARSHIFT Gameplay Trailer HD [Official]
snippet.description:
WARSHIFT gameplay is a unique mix of Action, Strategy and RPG elements that forms an innovative game genre. You can collect resources, build base, manage armies, and then come down to keep the enemies at gunpoint, gain experience in dynamic battles and customize your main characters and vehicles.
 Project WARSHIFT is being developed by one person - Cyril Megem, who is both artist, game designer and programmer in this project. He worked hard to implement many his and community's innovative ideas in this game.
Official site: http://warshift.com
Warshift T-Raptor teaser: https://youtu.be/hr96wdEmHnI
Warshift official trailer: https://youtu.be/AuASooXmvv4

Any unauthorized copying or re-publishing of this video strictly prohibited!
© 2015 Nominia Ltd. Created by Cyril Megem. All rights reserved.
